subject: VAM PRO
description_text:
Hello, I just purchased (from Amazon) and received the Pro X Ultra pedals
and VAM PRO motors. I think there is an issue with the control box. The
power cable sparks when it gets plugged in and that makes me very nervous.
Also the VAM PRO motors will only function for a few moments before they
lose signal and don't work until the PC is restarted. They have not
continuously worked for more than a minute. I have installed and
reinstalled the software 3 times. Everything is updated. Could I have some
direction as to what to do from here.

Thanks,
Dave H.

conversations.body_text: Hi David Houle,     Please follow the steps below:     Press and hold the upgrade button on the Pro X main controller, then reconnect the USB cable.     Open SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 and check if it has entered recovery mode.     If recovery mode is detected, go to Settings → Update → Manual Update Firmware → pedals → firmware → pedals-​  proxultra.sfu  .     After the update is complete, test the device to see if it has been restored successfully.

i have returned these items.
